instructions: Touch and hold a word, then move the grab points to adjust the selection. Tap Highlight, then tap the Highlight Color Chooser button to choose a highlight color or to underline. To remove a highlight or underline, tap the text, then tap the Trash button .
Touch and hold a word, then move the grab points to adjust the selection. Tap Note, use the keyboard to enter text, then tap Done.
Touch and hold a word, then move the grab points to adjust the selection. Tap Share, then choose a method.

Connect iPhone and your computer using USB . Do one of the following: In the Finder sidebar on your Mac: Select your iPhone, then click General at the top of the window. Note: To use the Finder to update your iPhone, macOS Catalina is required. With earlier versions of macOS, use iTunes to update your iPhone. In the iTunes app on your Windows PC: Click the iPhone button near the top left of the iTunes window, then click Summary. Click Check for Update. To install an available update, click Update.
